root.name: Sniper: Art Of Victory
root.description: The game shares similarities with other sniper-focused FPS games, such as Sniper Elite and Sniper: Ghost Warrior (developed by the same company).System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 1.Ghz CPUMemory: 512Mb RamGraphics: ATI Radeon 8500 or Nvidia GeForce3 DirectX: DirectX 9.0Hard Drive: 2GbSound: 16-bit DirectX 9 Compatible Sound Card
